title: "No power but what voters give you:" Joshua Johnson, Michael Kruse and Marc Ambinder
description: Michael Kruse, senior staff writer at Politico, and Joshua Johnson, host of “The Week with Joshua Johnson” on MSNBC, join Chuck to talk about former President Trump's exit from Washington. Plus, national security reporter Marc Ambinder looks at how the Biden presidency will react to the insurgent attack on the Capitol.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
